page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: The local doctor on average was about 2 miles distant and the area was covered by a district nurse, and the hospitals in both Tunbridge Wells and Maidstone gave good services with transport available for people who need it People are interested in a large variety of subjects which they study or in some cases teach both at home or at evening classes these include Writing Astrology Gardening Music Appreciation Languages Keepfit Jogging Poetry History Reading Embroidery Shooting Walking Swimming Squash Riding Playing Musical instruments Weaving Dancing Most of the teenagers learn to drive as soon as they are 17 and are then able to go out without having to be delivered and collected by parents
